explains: adv. 言之有理地，无可非议地

sentences.en: He was justifiably proud of his achievements.
sentences.cn: 他无可非议地为自己的成就感到骄傲。

sentences.en: The university can be justifiably proud of its record.
sentences.cn: 这所大学有理由为自己的纪录而自豪。

sentences.en: Indeed, she now says she intends to Sue for harassment, and justifiably.
sentences.cn: 确实，她现在说她要起诉被骚扰了，并且证据确凿。
